name: Push-ups
description: A classic bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Squats
description: A fundamental lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Pull-ups
description: An upper body pulling exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Deadlifts
description: A full-body compound movement that targets the posterior chain.

name: Overhead Press
description: A vertical pressing movement that targets the shoulders and triceps.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise that targets the quadriceps and glutes.

name: Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps and chest.

name: Bicep Curls
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps.

name: Tricep Extensions
description: An isolation exercise that targets the triceps.

name: Lat Pulldowns
description: A pulling exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi and rhomboids.

name: Leg Press
description: A leg exercise performed on a machine that targets the quadriceps.

name: Shoulder Shrugs
description: An exercise that targets the upper trapezius muscles.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core strengthening exercise.

name: Russian Twists
description: A core exercise that targets the obliques and rectus abdominis.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: An upper chest exercise performed on an inclined bench.

name: Calf Raises
description: An exercise that targets the calf muscles.

name: Rows
description: A pulling exercise that targets the middle back and rhomboids.

name: Lateral Raises
description: An isolation exercise that targets the lateral deltoids.

name: Leg Curls
description: An isolation exercise that targets the hamstrings.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A full-body cardio exercise that targets the core and legs.

name: Hammer Curls
description: A bicep exercise that also targets the forearms.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: A tricep-focused variation of the bench press.

name: Face Pulls
description: A rear deltoid exercise that improves posture.

name: Goblet Squats
description: A squat variation using a dumbbell or kettlebell.

name: Decline Bench Press
description: A lower chest exercise performed on a declined bench.

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
description: A single-leg exercise that targets the quadriceps and glutes.

name: T-Bar Rows
description: A rowing exercise that targets the middle back.

name: Arnold Press
description: A shoulder exercise that combines a press with rotation.

name: Hanging Knee Raises
description: A core exercise that targets the lower abs.

name: Cable Flyes
description: An isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles.

name: Romanian Deadlifts
description: A deadlift variation that emphasizes the hamstrings.
